message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, I am only willing to pay up to $850,000 for it. Let me know if this is acceptable.

Bob, I understand your position, but $850,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $950,000, reflecting the value you've mentioned. This would still be a good deal for both of us.  Let me know if you're interested in this compromise.

Alice, thank you for your willingness to negotiate. I understand your position and appreciate your compromise. However, I am still not able to meet you at $950,000. I am willing to pay up to $900,000 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
